== Prerequisites ==

StokesDT runs on x86 based Linux systems with Pentium 4 or more recent processors. To build the source code, StokesDT requires Intel C++ compipler version 13.0 or greater and MKL version 11.0 or greater. To use the Matlab interface, it also requires installing the latest Maltab and the Mex compiler.
